segments.text: How many cleaning ladies does your company hire ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have two cleaning ladies . But both of them have received little education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most cleaning ladies are illiterate . But some of them do a very nice job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I actually dislike another lady . She is more capable and seems to have ideas of her own . But the trouble is she Isa backseat driver with some of us . She would tell you what to do and where to put things .
segments.speaker: S2
